alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 12:10AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Louis County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1210 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Whiteface Reservoir, to near Meadowlands, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Whiteface Reservoir around 1230 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Canyon, Cotton and Fairbanks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
